it.polimi.se2.meteocal.control

Class NotificationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2.meteocal.control.NotificationManager

  • public class NotificationManager
extends Object
    Control class that takes care of the notification management: create, delete, update and search Notification entities; management of invitation choice (accept/decline)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NotificationManager()

      Manage user choice (accept or decline) for an invitation: if the user accepts, the method adds the event to the current user's calendar (if he/she owns one).

      • save

        public void save(Notification notification)
        Method to save the notification in the database
        Parameters:
        notification: - the notification that needs to be saved in the database

      • getCurrentUserUnreadNotifications

        public List<Notification> getCurrentUserUnreadNotifications()
        Query to get the unread notifications for the current user
        Returns:
        the list of unread notifications, ordered by date, or null if none found

      • getNotificationById

        public Notification getNotificationById(int notificationId)
        Query to get a notification by its ID
        Parameters:
        notificationId: - the ID of the notification
        Returns:
        the desired notification or null if not found

      • setAsRead

        public void setAsRead(Notification notification)
        Sets a notification as read
        Parameters:
        notification: - the notification that needs to be set as read

      • manageInvitationChoice

        public void manageInvitationChoice(boolean accept,
                                   Notification invitation)
        Manage user choice (accept or decline) for an invitation: if the user accepts, the method adds the event to the current user's calendar (if he/she owns one). In both cases it sets this notification as read and sends a response back to the organizer of the event
        Parameters:
        accept: - true if the user accepts the invitation, false if he/she refuses
        invitation: - the invitation received

      • sendNotification

        public Notification sendNotification(String title,
                                     String content,
                                     boolean invitation,
                                     User receiver,
                                     Event linkedEvent)
        Sends a notification to the desired user, with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        title: - the title of the new notification
        content: - the content of the new notification
        invitation: - true if it's an invitation
        receiver: - the user that will receive the notification
        linkedEvent: - the event linked with the notification
        Returns:
        the notification object that the method generates

      • delete

        public void delete(Notification notification)
        Method to delete a notification from the database
        Parameters:
        notification: - the notification that needs to be deleted
